title: Re: My Text Art
content:
Sorry, I have no knowledge of the code tags. Just remember to close the current colour tag before starting a new one, I guess that could perhaps do something.

As for the art, it's called ASCII art.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url] :: [url=http://www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/levels/xky1tuned.zip]xky1tuned.zip[/url]
